tasks.task: MAINTASK: Conducting a diversified farm and vineyard operation.
subtasks: Operating a winery (e.g., making grape, honey, and raspberry wines).
Practicing crop rotation and soil management (e.g., planting corn, alfalfa, hay, wheat; turning some land back into wetlands; increasing non-crop habitat areas).
Hosting community events and weddings (e.g., weddings, private events, gathering spaces).

tasks.task: Managing a diversified farm with multiple enterprises.
subtasks: Cattle ranching (e.g., beef cattle, dry edible beans, custom cattle feeding).
Crop farming (e.g., corn, alfalfa, grass hay, wheat, silage corn).
Winemaking (e.g., grape wine, honey wine, raspberry wine).
Hosting various events (e.g., weddings, birthday parties, anniversaries, memorials).
Enhancing public perception and wildlife habitat (e.g., creating wetlands, supporting wildlife).

tasks.task: Adapting to varying agricultural conditions through careful planning.
subtasks: Adjusting crop choices based on soil pH and drainage (e.g., trying new corn varieties).
Rotating crops to maintain soil health and fertility.
Using non-crop land for pasture or wetland habitat.
Monitoring and managing wildlife (e.g., deer deterring corn and grapes; appreciating cranes).
Applying new irrigation techniques on water-prone areas.
Enhancing water-saving features in existing operations.
